Engine

This is the game which got me into FPS gaming back when I was a kid. It's still fun and probably the best mod of Half Life. Have made countless of friends via Counter Strike 1.6, and I've been lucky to even meet some of them. It's really surprising to see so many servers still up and running. I have switched to CSGO, but I do play 1.6 from time to time to rejuvenate the memories :')

Tight game, works great on Slackware/kde too. Lots of fun, a total classic that fancy graphics and unnecessary fluff will never beat. Pure team based fps of the highest order.
